attributes.action: Transition Protection for Skilled Worker in UK and their 5 yrs route to ILR
attributes.additional_details:
We urge the Home Secretary ,the UK Government and the parliament to:
Protect the integrity of immigration policy:
1-Respect and retain the 5-year ILR path for those already on it.
2-Communicate clearly and prevent needless uncertainty and distress.
3-Respect the commitments made to migrants who built their lives here under existing terms.
This is about more than immigration policy; it is about trust, principle, and doing the right thing.
attributes.background: We urge to keep 5yr ILR for skilled workers already in UK.Skilled worker contribute a lot in the economy filled key roles,paid taxes, built lives. Delaying ILR harms 1 million families in UK with high visa unexpected high fees and impact their mental well-being and disturb their kids education plan.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Keep the 5-Year ILR pathway for existing Skilled Worker visa holders
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727360
